package.description: avr_bridge is meant to be bridge between an avr microcontroller and ROS. This is supposed to allow us to send arbitrary data structures over serial and have them be published in ROS. It features a avr C++ code generator (gen_avr.py) , a serial to ros bridge (bridge_node.py), and a udev script system to automatically name your aduino the correct hardware device name.
package.author: Adam Stambler, Cody Schafer, Phillip Quiza
